00002 
00003 import java.util.ArrayList;
00004 import java.util.List;

00009 public abstract class PreconditionLogic implements Precondition {
00010     private List<Precondition> nestedPreconditions = new ArrayList<Precondition>();
00011 
00012     public List<Precondition> getNestedPreconditions() {
00013         return this.nestedPreconditions;
00014     }
00015 
00016     public void addNestedPrecondition(Precondition precondition) {
00017         nestedPreconditions.add(precondition);
00018     }
